Big Mac
■This shows the
correctly made
Big Mac.

Procedure
■Place the toasted Big Mac buns
in the special box.

Procedure
■Hit both the
club and heel
with a shot of
Big Mac sauce.

Procedure
■Put the onions
on top of both
heel and club.

Procedure
■Top each bun
with a slice
of lettuce.

Procedure
■Put two
pickles on top
of the heel.

Procedure
■Put a slice
of cheese on
the club.

Procedure
■Put a 1/10th
patty from
the UHC on
each bun.

Procedure
■Finally, put the assembled club
on top of the assembled heel. Put
the crown on top of it all.

Procedure
■Close the lid of the box and
slide it down the HLZ.
